name: EcoBrush Bamboo Toothbrush
eco_facts: Made from 100% biodegradable bamboo handle. Packaging is plastic-free. Certified FSC.

name: Reusable Organic Cotton Shopping Bag
eco_facts: Reusable, made with certified organic cotton. GOTS and Fair Trade certified.

name: 100% Recycled Paper Notebook
eco_facts: Made entirely from post-consumer recycled paper. Blue Angel certified.

name: Glass Water Bottle (500ml)
eco_facts: Reusable glass bottle, BPA-free, reduces single-use plastic waste.
